only_totals: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m.cpf) FROM motorista m WHERE m.codmotorista = (SELECT codmotorista FROM motorista WHERE cpf = m.cpf ORDER BY COALESCE(dataatual, datainclusao) DESC LIMIT 1 );
initial_sync: SELECT mot.codmotorista, coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao) AS dataatual,mot.cpf,mot.liberado,mot.nome,mot.celular,mot.fone,mot.bloqueadoadm from motorista mot WHERE mot.codmotorista = (select mot2.codmotorista from motorista mot2 where mot.cpf = mot2.cpf order by coalesce(mot2.dataatual, mot2.datainclusao) desc limit 1 ) ORDER BY coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao), codmotorista;
daily_sync: SELECT mot.codmotorista, coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao) AS dataatual, mot.cpf, mot.liberado, mot.nome, mot.celular, mot.fone, mot.bloqueadoadm, mot.obsbloq, mb.descricao AS motivobloqueio FROM motorista mot LEFT OUTER JOIN motivobloqueio mb ON(mot.codmotivobloqueio = mb.codmotivobloqueio) WHERE coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao) >= '[$]' ORDER BY coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao) ASC;
working_table: SELECT mot.codmotorista, coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao) AS dataatual,mot.cpf,mot.liberado,mot.nome,mot.celular,mot.fone,mot.bloqueadoadm from motorista mot WHERE mot.codmotorista = (select mot2.codmotorista from motorista mot2 where mot.cpf = mot2.cpf order by coalesce(mot2.dataatual, mot2.datainclusao) desc limit 1 ) ORDER BY coalesce(mot.dataatual, mot.datainclusao) DESC LIMIT 1;
total_by_date: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m.cpf) FROM motorista m WHERE  coalesce(m.dataatual, m.datainclusao) >= '[$]';
total_by_status_0: select 'QTDMotoristas' as Tipo, 0 as Status,(SELECT count(mot.codmotorista)  FROM motorista mot WHERE mot.codmotorista = (select mot2.codmotorista from motorista mot2 where mot.cpf = mot2.cpf order by coalesce(mot2.dataatual, mot2.datainclusao) desc limit 1 ) AND mot.liberado = 'S' ) as QTD,current_date  as Data;
total_by_status_1: select  'QTDMotoristas' as Tipo, 1 as Status, (SELECT count(mot.codmotorista) FROM motorista mot  WHERE mot.codmotorista = (select mot2.codmotorista from motorista mot2 where mot.cpf = mot2.cpf  order by coalesce(mot2.dataatual, mot2.datainclusao) desc limit 1 )  AND mot.liberado = 'N' AND  mot.bloqueadoadm <> 'S' ) as QTD, current_date  as Data;
total_by_status_2: select  'QTDMotoristas' as Tipo, 2 as Status, (SELECT count(mot.codmotorista) FROM motorista mot  WHERE mot.codmotorista = (select mot2.codmotorista from motorista mot2 where mot.cpf = mot2.cpf  order by coalesce(mot2.dataatual, mot2.datainclusao) desc limit 1 ) AND mot.liberado = 'N' AND  mot.bloqueadoadm = 'S') as QTD, current_date  as data;
